thread.title: Linda Atherstone
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Linda Atherstone

author: Linda Atherstone
title: Linda Atherstone
text:
I live in France and to get my Barbour coat over with no extra cost was superb. Decided, I needed the hood and was not sure which one would suit. Telephoned and again, very helpful and ordered one which came within five days.
Thank you and would certainly recommend you.
